details.heldBy: London Metropolitan Archives: City of London
details.description:
Include images of temples and general landscapes including Uyeno, Atagoyama, Kobe, Yokohama, Odawara, Hatta, Papenbeng and Kinkakuji.

\xa0

The majority of photos are of Japan and there is handwritten list describing some of these images. There is also a photograph of the memorial to the British casualties of the 1857 uprising at Cawnpur, India
